desc: We sell a variety of dog beds and mattresses filled with sheep’s wool, that are a lot healthier than traditional dog beds. Visit our website for more information.

layout.text: Wooly Woofers, Healthy Wool Dog Beds and Mattresses, UK

Did you know that the typical memory foam dog bed may be a leading cause of your dog's health problems? These beds can cause behavioural issues, skin irritation and respiration problems. This is due to the harmful chemicals used in the production of memory foam beds. Some of the chemicals include chlorofluorocarbons, trichlorofluoromethane and formaldehyde. These can affect your dog's health and behaviour.
This is why WoolyWoofers dog beds are made with 100% British sheep wool to provide your dog with the healthiest sleeeping environment.
